description: From Urdu پاجامہ‎ (pājāma)/Hindi पैजामा (paijāmā), from Persian پایجامه / پاجامه‎ (pâyjâma / pâjâma, “leg garment”), akin to پا‎ (“leg”) + جامه‎ (“garment”).

entries.meaning: Clothes for wearing to bed and sleeping in, usually consisting of a loose-fitting shirt and pants/trousers.
Loose-fitting trousers worn by both sexes in various southern Asian countries including India.
